Posts.Content: Dec 23, 2012 06:58AM obingham wrote: These stories are what keeps me looking for answers for my mom. I want to believe that they are true, but a lot of them I hear are tied to some book or someone that wants to charge you for the information.Â  If I had a miracle cure I'd give it away for free. For all of those that have BC or any kind of cancer I hope these miracle survivors do hold the key to some information on how to beat this thing and that they share it with us soon! Holding out hope!
Posts.Title: What do you make of the miracle stories? Skream DivineMrsM
